Text:
Subtitle for Foreign parts only can be downloaded from here:

http://v2.subscene.com/english/premium-rush/subtitle-657975.aspx

WTF? Why not just hardcode the English subs for the non-English parts? This is an English movie, after all.

I must say, rather disappointing ETRG.

@michaelrwatson
Don't be lazy! It is a good movie, worth the extra few clicks that it takes to DL the sub file/
NL subtitles can be found on http://www.ondertitelzoeken.nl/ondertitels/Dutch/Premium%20Rush%20/1547234/
